headlessDescription: This agent runs without a terminal. It communicates via MCP tools and the inbox system.
chooseRuntime: Choose an AI runtime to add to your team
customCommandHint: Provide a command for your runtime in <1>Advanced options → Command Override</1>.
configureMcpStdio: Configure your runtime to add an MCP stdio server named
addMcpConfigOrFlag: 2) Add this MCP server config (or pass it via
restartAfterConfig: Restart the runtime after updating this config.
foremanLeads: Foreman leads the team. Peers are worker agents.
firstAgentForeman: First agent must be the foreman (team leader).
secretsStoredLocally: Stored locally under <1>CCCC_HOME/state/…</1> (not in group ledger). Values are never shown again.
secretsFormat: Supports <1>KEY=VALUE</1> and shell-style <2>export KEY=VALUE</2> (quotes / semicolons / inline comments).
leaveEmptyForId: Leave empty to use the agent ID as display name
runtimeChangesNote: Runtime/command changes take effect after restart. Use "Save & Restart" to apply immediately.
hoverToPreviewMasked: Hover a key to preview a masked value.
pendingConvertSecretsPreview: Previewing keys from the linked profile (pending convert). Click Save or Save & Restart to apply to this actor.
secretsAppliedNote: Secrets are applied when you click <1>Save</1> or <1>Save & Restart</1> below.
setUpdate: Set / Update (supports KEY=VALUE, export, quotes, semicolons)
unset: Unset (supports unset KEY / KEY / KEY=, with semicolons)
clearAllKeys: Clear all secret keys on save
failedToLoadSecrets: Failed to load secret env metadata
secretsStoredLocallyEdit: Stored locally under <1>CCCC_HOME/state/…</1> (not in group ledger).
saveAndRestartConfirm: Save changes and restart "{{label}}" now? This will interrupt any running work.
saveSecretsAndRestartConfirm: Save changes, apply secrets, and restart "{{label}}" now? This will interrupt any running work.
savedRestartRequired: Saved. Restart "{{label}}" to apply runtime/profile/secret changes.
scopeAlreadyAttached: This directory already has a working group. Opening it instead.
createdButFailedAttach: Created group but failed to attach: {{message}}
destGroupDifferent: Destination group must be different from the source group.
commandOverrideRequired: Command override is enabled. Please enter a command.
selectProfileFirst: Please select an actor profile first.
useSavedProfileNowConfirm:
Saved "{{name}}" to Actor Profiles.

Use this profile for "{{actor}}" now?

OK: switch to this profile now
Cancel: keep current custom config
profileSelectedPendingSave: Profile "{{name}}" selected. Click Save or Save & Restart to apply.
profileAttachedPendingRestart: Switched to profile "{{name}}". Click Save & Restart to apply runtime changes.
linkedProfileHint: Runtime, command, and secrets are managed by this profile. Applied revision: {{revision}}.
convertToCustomConfirm: Convert this actor to custom now? It will snapshot current profile config and secrets.
convertToCustomConfirmWithName: Convert "{{name}}" to custom now? It will snapshot current profile config and secrets.
managedByProfile: This actor is managed by an Actor Profile.
managedByProfileCustomHint: Convert to Custom to unlock manual runtime, command, and secret editing.
profileControlsRuntimeFields: Runtime and command are profile-controlled. Convert to custom to edit them.
linkedSecretsHint: Secrets are managed by the linked profile. Edit them in Settings > Actor Profiles.
